name: 8 Queens
description:
8 Queens is a simple puzzle game where you need to arrange the maximum number of queens on a chessboard so that they don't “beat” each other. Arrange the queens and pump your mind!

- 16 levels (from 5x5 to 20x20)
- all sorts of options on each of them
- pleasant music
- addictive gameplay
- thematic achievements

As soon as possible:
- themed trading cards
- themed backgrounds
- themed emoticons
